data.title: Samsung Semiconductor USA
data.meta_description: Samsung's System LSI division designs core semiconductors. Explore how System LSI leads the field of system semiconductors, from everyday electronics to 5G and AI.
data.text:
Everything from the competitiveness of artificial intelligence to system semiconductors in the 5G era begins with design. From architecture design to software development, and even all the way to quality verification, the System LSI Division, Samsung's only fabless division, is breaking barriers for future semiconductor design through its leading R&D competitiveness. Everything from the competitiveness of artificial intelligence to system semiconductors in the 5G era begins with design. From architecture design to software development, and even all the way to quality verification, the System LSI Division, Samsung's only fabless division, is breaking barriers for future semiconductor design through its leading R&D competitiveness. Everything from the competitiveness of artificial intelligence to system semiconductors in the 5G era begins with design. From architecture design to software development, and even all the way to quality verification, the System LSI Division, Samsung's only fabless division, is breaking barriers for future semiconductor design through its leading R&D competitiveness.

The System LSI Division is designing core semiconductors that we need for living our daily lives in the era of 5G and artificial intelligence. Samsung is providing new experiences in many different ways through the ongoing innovation of various products such as security ICs, display driving ICs, power management ICs, and smart card ICs. The System LSI Division is designing core semiconductors that we need for living our daily lives in the era of 5G and artificial intelligence. Samsung is providing new experiences in many different ways through the ongoing innovation of various products such as security ICs, display driving ICs, power management ICs, and smart card ICs. The System LSI Division is designing core semiconductors that we need for living our daily lives in the era of 5G and artificial intelligence. Samsung is providing new experiences in many different ways through the ongoing innovation of various products such as security ICs, display driving ICs, power management ICs, and smart card ICs.

In 2018, the System LSI Division launched the industry's first multi-mode modem supporting 5G mobile communication standards, which was created thanks to the Division’s continuous R&D. Our ISOCELL image sensors, which finally broke the 200-million-pixel barrier after breaking the 100-million one for the first time in mobile industry history, is a mobile image market-leading product with unique pixel design technology, such as the ISOCELL 3.0, etc., as well as various image processing technologies like pixel binning, etc. In 2018, the System LSI Division launched the industry's first multi-mode modem supporting 5G mobile communication standards, which was created thanks to the Division’s continuous R&D. Our ISOCELL image sensors, which finally broke the 200-million-pixel barrier after breaking the 100-million one for the first time in mobile industry history, is a mobile image market-leading product with unique pixel design technology, such as the ISOCELL 3.0, etc., as well as various image processing technologies like pixel binning, etc. In 2018, the System LSI Division launched the industry's first multi-mode modem supporting 5G mobile communication standards, which was created thanks to the Division’s continuous R&D. Our ISOCELL image sensors, which finally broke the 200-million-pixel barrier after breaking the 100-million one for the first time in mobile industry history, is a mobile image market-leading product with unique pixel design technology, such as the ISOCELL 3.0, etc., as well as various image processing technologies like pixel binning, etc.

As the system semiconductor market continues to grow at an alarming rate, the competition to secure world-leading semiconductor design capabilities is intensifying with it. In order to lead the system semiconductor market of the AI and 5G era, the System LSI Division is strengthening next-generation technologies through investment in R&D and recruitment of outstanding employees.
